t: The 5 Worst Habits Of Selfish Brands - Rohit Bhargava
s: July 16, 2015 - Their ads seek to interrupt us and every interaction is clearly only focused on either closing a deal or collecting our information for their database. They think in terms of short term revenue instead of long term value. They look at customers are only a necessity on their way to making a profit. And they make the world a worse place. The good news is consumers have more ways than ever to filter these brands out and expose their selfishness ...

t: Amazon brand name protection is really a joke!!
